summary: Product Manager with 8 years of experience. Passionate about driving product innovation and leveraging technology for good. Skilled in translating market insights into winning product strategies that deliver customer-centric solutions. Expertise in scaling B2B2C products, product discovery, roadmap planning, agile methodologies, and team leadership. Let's connect and discuss how I can help drive your product vision to new heights with a positive impact!
headline: Entrepreneur | Product Manager | #HumaneTech and #TechforGood advocate

experience.description:
A B2G startup providing the public sector with digital platforms for citizen participation | 🏅 1M users, 150 clients (French National Assembly, NYC, EU), 1,5M€ annual earning (50% recurring)

As a CPO, I:
- Achieved product-market fit by developing a SaaS offer based on the Decidim open source software
- Shaped the product vision and strategy using input from a wide range of stakeholders
- Made sure we stayed close to our users problems by implementing discovery practices (User’s club,  End user user interviews)
- Defined the roadmap and set objectives for the whole team using OKRs
- Implemented SCRUM and planning poker with the dev team to make sure delivery ran smoothly
- Recruited and coached 3 PMs

As a co-founder I:
- Benchmarked & contributed to major open source civic tech products
- Established international relationships with their founders (Pol.is, Decidim, Consul)
- Spoke at global conferences (Paris, Lyon, Taipei, Madrid, Barcelona) and gave interviews to major media outlets (Le Monde, Arte, RFI)
- Championed open source & data for digital democracy in public sector, contributing to industry standards (resulting in competitors adopting open source).
- Recruited talent and structured the teams responsible for tech, communication, sales, data
experience.title: Co-founder and CPO

experience.description:
- Taught “Democratic Innovations, an introduction to participatory democracy and civic tech”
- 12 sessions, directed at "Digital, New Technology and Public Policy" masters students.

publications.name: L’invasion des comptes spam sur les plateformes de participation en ligne
publications.description: Analyse de la problématique et présentation de notre solution combinant, CAPTCHA accessible et blocage automatisé grâce à la création d'un modèle spécialisé de machine learning.

publications.name: La participation citoyenne après la révolution numérique
publications.publisher: Mémoire de master 2 - Sciences Po Paris

publications.name: How To Make a Net Party
publications.description: After two month of field observation in Buenos Aires, we've build this  manual on how to build a political party based on online technologies for democratic participation such as DemocracyOS. Based on the experience of the Partido de la Red from Buenos Aires, Argentina that got over 1% of the votes in 2013. All information is backed with field interviews with party members and Democracy OS stakeholders.

publications.name: Les enjeux juridiques du Web 2.0
publications.description: Les enjeux juridique sur le Web sont souvent flous pour beaucoup d'utilisateur. Cet article tire trois enseignements utiles quand à l'application de la loi sur le Web.

projects.description: UV Damage is the reference website for UV-induced damage. Conceived and supported by an international board of dermatologists, it is intended for all healthcare professionals concerned with the cutaneous pathologies associated with ultraviolet radiation who want to update or further their knowledge. The site has a rich medical content, with links to Pubmed references.
